attributes.action: Ensure that criminals serve their full sentence, not part of it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Convicted criminals may be offered parole on the grounds of 'good behaviour'.  How good than their behaviour possibly be when they are convicted criminals?

Prisoners should serve their FULL sentence, otherwise why sentence them at all?  What is the point of saying life, when for some it could only mean 7 years?

Its time to sort out our sentencing laws, and ensure that convicted criminals are punished as the judge saw fit.  How these laws still be in existence when they are simply crazy is beyond me.
